contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Company | name = Extendicare Real Estate Investment Trust | logo = | type = Public | genre = | foundation = | founder = | location_city = [[Markham, Ontario]] | location_country = Canada | location = | locations = | area_served = | key_people = Timothy L. Lukenda | industry = Asset Management | products = | services = | market cap = | revenue = | operating_income = | net_income = | assets = | equity = | owner = | num_employees = 37,700 (2008)<ref name=zenobank>{{cite web |url=http://zenobank.com/index.php?symbol=CA;EXE.UN&page=quotesearch |title=Company Profile for Extendicare Real Estate Investment Trust (CA;EXE.UN) |accessdate=2008-10-08}}</ref> | parent = | divisions = | subsid = | homepage = [http://www.extendicare.com www.extendicare.com] | footnotes = | intl = }} '''Extendicare Real Estate Investment Trust''' ({{tsx|EXE.un}}) is a [[Toronto]], [[Ontario]] based company that operates 440 long-term care facilities across North America. The company became a [[REIT]] and began trading on the TSX on November 10, 2006 under the symbol EXE.UN.[http://www.extendicare.com/investor/investor.html] '''ParaMed Home Health Care''' is a division of Extendicare (Canada) Inc. ParaMed was founded more than 30 years ago. It is currently the largest home care provider in Ontario{{Fact|date=July 2008}}. ParaMed also operates in Alberta. == References == {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.extendicare.com/ Extendicare Official site] www.paramed.ca [[Category:Companies listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange]] [[Category:Health care companies of Canada]] [[Category:S&P/TSX Composite Index]] {{med-company-stub}} {{canada-company-stub}}
